Description: Stone axe. The blade is ground from one face only and the cutting edge is at the interface with the other face. Polished all over. Small chips on the cutting edge. Impact marks at the haft end.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2003 10 Apr-31 Aug, Barcelona, CaixaForum, Nubia: Los reinos del Nilo en Sudan 2003/4 23 Sep-4 Jan, Madrid, Sala de Exposiciones de la Fundacio, Nubia: Los reinos del Nilo en Sudan
Acquisition name: Donated by: Wellcome Institute for the History of Medicine (Eastern Africa)
Division of Finds: National Corporation for Antiquities and Museums (NCAM)
